author: Lee_Fogel
title: Neat concept but zero playability
review:
My oldest son and I went to the May 'Make 'n Take' event that Toys R Us had with this brick figure being the Lego piece to take home.

It is a quick build and does look the part once all together. While unique it's a bit ho-hum in that there is no real playability with it. It's designed to be a static figure. So, for my son, it is a boring Lego toy. After putting it together and leaving it out for a few days he disassembled it and is using it for spare/extra parts. I did not find any parts that were notable or unique. 

Overall I like the idea behind it and they did capture the look of Princess Leia in brick form. But it offers no play content. I'd really say it's either for collectors of SW Lego universe or a diehard Princess Leia fan.
